pages.text: Sho seiza no aru ten ni oite
yakusoku sa reta (shinpan no)-bi ni oite
rissho suru mono to, rissho sa reru mono to ni oite (chikau)
Ana no junin wa horobosa re
hi ni wa maki ga tsugi tasa reru
Miyo. Kare-ra wa sono hata ni suwari
shinja ni taishite kare-ra ga okonatta koto (no subete) ni tsuite, rissho sa reru
Kare-ra ga kare-ra (shinja) o hakugai shita no wa, iryoku aru okata, sanbi sa rerubeki okata arra o, kare-ra (shinja) ga shinko shita tame nihokanaranai
Kare ni, ten to ji no taiken wa zokusuru. Arra wa subete no koto no rissho-sha de ara reru
Hontoni shinko suru otome o hakugai shite, sorekara kaigo shinakatta mono ni wa jigoku no chobatsu ga ari, mata kare-ra ni wa homurabi no chobatsu ga arou
Shinko shite zenko ni isoshinda mono ni wa, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ga arou. Kore wa idaina kofuku no jojudearu
Hontoni anata no omo no torae-kata (chobatsu) wa kyoretsudearu
Kare koso wa sozo o nasa re, mata sore o kurikaesa reru okatadearu
Kare wa, kan'yo ni shite hakuai narabinai okata
Eiko ni michita, shiko no gyokuza no omo
Kare wa o nozomi no koto o, suiko nasa reru
Gunzei no monogatari ga, anata ni tasshita ka
firuaun to samudo (no min no)
Iya, shinjinai mono wa (nao shinri o) usodearu to shite iru
Daga arra wa, haigo kara kare-ra o tori kakoma reru
Iya kore wa, eiko ni michita kuruan de
shugo sa reta ishibumi-ban ni (meiki sa rete iru)
